Header: 68 GOC Visits his Under Command Formations
Content: Major General R.M.P.J Rathnayake, General Officer Commanding, 68 Division visited the 683 Brigade HQ and a few under command formations on Tuesday (7) in order to receive an update on the functional aspects of those units. He was greeted to a Guard Turnout at the entrance to the 683 Brigade HQ on arrival and was received by respective Senior Officers. He was also invited to plant saplings and add compliments to the Visitors' Book during those stays.
